description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $5.0M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with 9090 5092 Quebec. The average
  contract duration was 1.33 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $4.6M. The longest
  contract was 1.59 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $6.0M.
